user.name: weblogic
user.description: This user is the default administrator.

group.name: Administrators
group.description: Administrators can view and modify all resource attributes and start and stop servers.

group.name: Deployers
group.description: Deployers can view all resource attributes and deploy applications.

group.name: Operators
group.description: Operators can view and modify all resource attributes and perform server lifecycle operations.

group.name: Monitors
group.description: Monitors can view and modify all resource attributes and perform operations not restricted by roles.

group.name: CrossDomainConnectors
group.description: CrossDomainConnectors can make inter-domain calls from foreign domains.

group.name: AdminChannelUsers
group.description: AdminChannelUsers can access the admin channel.

role.name: Deployer
role.description: View the server configuration and deploy applications.

role.name: Operator
role.description: Operators can view and modify all resource attributes and perform server lifecycle operations.

role.name: Monitor
role.description: Monitors can view and modify all resource attributes and perform operations not restricted by roles.

role.name: CrossDomainConnector
role.description: CrossDomainConnectors can make inter-domain calls from foreign domains.

role.name: AdminChannelUser
role.description: AdminChannelUsers can access the admin channel.
